purposeDescriptions.low: encourages tissue growth, granting improved health the following day
purposeDescriptions.mid: forces lacerations closed, granting improved health the following day but stressing the body immediately
purposeDescriptions.high: stitches together all but the most extreme wounds, causing extreme shock
purposeDescriptions.invLow: stops natural tissue growth for up to a day
purposeDescriptions.invMid: reopens old scars and prevents healing for a short time
purposeDescriptions.invHigh: reopens old wounds and rebreaks healed bones
